entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
